docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Oct. 31 -- Britain took the lead today in the fight for a ban on nuclear testing based on a firm treaty.
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Oct. 31 -- Britain took the lead today in the fight for a ban on nuclear testing based on a firm treaty.

headline.main: Britain Urges Firm Test Ban; Tells U.N. Controls Are Needed

byline.original: By SAM POPE BREWER Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: An easier trend developed for the principal currencies in the foreign exchange market during the past week. Business turnover was heavy at times.

docs.snippet: The retailing phenomenon known as discounting will be examined in depth here this week at a seminar expected to attract 800 retailing, realty and banking executives.
